channel.title: Deltascape, GLITCH,?
channel.description:
HI,
i need a lil help with the deltacape, GLITCH, people are complaing that they are dieing sometimes, when they logg in, anyway to stop this glitch? OR MAYBE WHEN, YOU DIE YOU DONT LOSE ITEMS??
any ideas,..

item.title: Deltascape, GLITCH,?
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“Gh0stb4rr4g3, post:2, topic:240132”]Search for // If killed apply dead
then under ResetAttack(); add:

client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+" ");

And the dieing glitch is a anti leech thing I think.[/quote]
thiers not… because delta would put thier but he having same problem… its just a glitch

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape, GLITCH,?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

quote author=Extoz link=topic=316415.msg2512862#msg2512862 date=1225394505]
Legend… Note that when you search for this

 // If killed apply dead

There’s a space after dead, you have delete that one to get any results in the search.
[/quote][quote=“Extoz, post:4, topic:240132”]Legend… Note that when you search for this

 // If killed apply dead

There’s a space after dead, you have delete that one to get any results in the search.[/quote]

were do i search it? and what do i search,?

Read full topic
